name: Flippy Dunk!
description:
=> Flippy Dunk !

Play extremely attractive basketball on your phone
Flippy Dunk: Ball through the Star is clicking the tapping game, you have to tap and jump to get as much score as possible.

=> How To Play ?

1. Tap on the screen to flap.
2. Do not let the ball fall.
3. Continuously touch the screen to direct the ball through the star.
4. Many characters ball to flappy play.

=> Flippy Dunk, Why not ? Lets try now!
And see how long, how far, how diamonds you can GET and you can GO !
